title: Can't redeem my Riot point's
body: So I bought a riot points card today worth 50 dollars and I'm trying to redeem it. When I select the purchase points icon the game closes and reopens to the main page. I've tried this three times but I get the same result. How do I fix this?

replies.body: Hi DDAWG20K, are you working with a Mac in this case? I ask because we're seeing other issues with RP purchases on Macs at the moment.

I'm gonna go ahead and assume you are on a mac?

This is a known issue that is currently being worked on, hang tight :)
